siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

markdownRemark.excerpt: Dear Listener, This week we discuss everything from Apple’s September 2021 event, “California Streaming”. Listen in to hear Stan and Jon’s take on what Apple…
markdownRemark.html:
Dear Listener,

This week we discuss everything from Apple’s September 2021 event, “California Streaming”.

Listen in to hear Stan and Jon’s take on what Apple announced, including:

  • Apple TV+
  • Updated iPad
  • New iPad Mini
  • Apple Watch Series 7
  • iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 Pro

You can also listen to all the music from the event on Apple Music:

Thanks for listening,

Stan Lemon & Jon Kohlmeier

frontmatter.title: Fall Technology, Movies and Back to School
